thread.title: Federal Landlord Rules Trump's DC Hotel Doesn’t Violate Lease Terms
thread.title_full: Federal Landlord Rules Trump's DC Hotel Doesn’t Violate Lease Terms

author: Allegra Kirkland
title: Federal Landlord Rules Trump's DC Hotel Doesn’t Violate Lease Terms
text:
The federal government agency that owns the building housing President Donald Trump’s Washington, D.C. hotel has determined that it does not violate the terms of its lease, the Associated Press reported Thursday.
The General Services Administration’s ruling comes as a huge blow for watchdog groups and Democrats who've charged that Trump’s presidency put his company in breach of the lease, which states that an elected official may not be involved with or benefit from the agreement.
